name: Cursed Canyon
description:
Enjoy an interesting twist on a Metroidvania. Explore the slime-filled caverns and the magical towers. Equip curses upon yourself to gain exciting new abilities, but at a cost...

****************************************************************

WASD / L-Stick / Dpad - Movement

Space / A - Jump / Select

LShift / X - Run

RShift / RCtrl / B / Y - Sword

Q / LBumper - Ice Magic (Freeze enemies)

E / RBumper - Fire Magic (Double Damage, Melt Ice, Regular Gravity Underwater)

Escape / Menu - Inventory (Equip Curses [Ability Items] at the expense of one Heart Point)

^,<,v,> / R-Stick - Dash when equiped *buggy

*****************************************************************

ITEMS (Equiped Curses will lock a Heart until it is unequiped.) :

Boot = Double Jump

Fist = Dash

Shield = *** NOT FUNCTIONAL YET

Bubble = Breath Underwater

Lightning = *** NOT FUNCTIONAL YET
